item.title: D4_persontime
item.description: Metadata Data Model Parameters Example {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"medatata_name":["Name of the dataset","Content of the dataset","Unit of observation","Dataset where the list of UoOs is fully listed and with 1 record per UoO","How many observations per UoO","NxUoO​","Variables capturing the UoO","Primary key","Parameters",null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null],"metadata_content":["D4_persontime","Persontime and number of cases calculated by grouping for a specific strata of ageband and sex​","A combination of ageband and sex","All agebands x all genders","As many as the methods of the analysis (in this case, 2)"
